event.title: January 2011, it has a population of 218,210 inhabitants being the Region’s second largest municipality and the country’s

data.event: As of January 2011, it has a population of 218,210 inhabitants being the Region’s second largest municipality and the country’s 6th non-Province capital city.
Much of the historical weight of Cartagena in the past goes to its coveted defensive port, one of the most important in the western Mediterranean.
